text:
I've installed the lenya on Tomcat 5.x version when i open it throught the 
browser it shows the followng error
"Illegal character in path at index 18: file:/C:/Documents and 
Settings/Administrator/Desktop/resin-2.1.16/resin-
2.1.16/webapps/lenya/lenya/pubs/default/config/ac/passwd/
"
Please help me out
creator: r.ashish.m@gmail.com

text:
Not a bug, but failure on your side to read and follow the installation instructions. No space in path to 
tomcat.
creator: hubertus@groepper.com
gregor@apache.org
text: note that in 1.2.4, this problem will finally go away :)
